Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at  75th/King Drive to Champlain
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses rerouted via 75th, King Dr, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage nr 75th/King Dr to Champlain

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/King Drive to Champlain.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at  75th/King Drive to Champlain
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses rerouted via 75th, King Dr, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage nr 75th/King Dr to Champlain

Headline: Temporary Northbound #54 Cicero Reroute near Cicero/Diversey
ShortDescription: Northbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted near Cicero/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Diversey, Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Cicero/Diversey.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark and #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark and 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#22 Clark and #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

 

 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Increased Wait Times on Red Line Service
ShortDescription: Red Line service is running with residual delays and busier trains/platforms: due to a Cubs game near Addison. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is running with residual delays and busier trains/platforms: due to a Cubs game near Addison.

Crews are working to accommodate all passengers and restore normal service as quickly as is possible.
